mapper.select: select * from ( select id as buyListId, date from orders where id=#{id} ) orders LEFT JOIN ( select orderId, itemId, count from OrderItems where orderId=#{id} ) oi ON orders.buyListId = oi.orderId LEFT JOIN ( select id, name, countName, price from Items ) it ON oi.itemId = it.id
mapper.insert:
SELECT `id` FROM `items` WHERE `name`=#{name}
INSERT INTO `items`( `name`, `countName`, `price` ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{countName}, #{price} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name=#{name}, countName=#{countName}, price=#{price}
mapper.delete: DELETE Orders, OrderItems FROM Orders LEFT JOIN OrderItems ON orders.id = OrderItems.orderId WHERE orders.id = #{id}
DELETE Items, OrderItems FROM Items LEFT JOIN OrderItems ON Items.id = OrderItems.itemId WHERE Items.id = #{id}
